file_content.text: Facial recognition = in process // Target = acquired
C-06X = Colicoid Creation Nest hunter unit // Payload = encrypted message from Darth Malgus
I met the Colicoids on Balmorra, but I've never heard of a Creation Nest.
Balmorran Colicoids = nonsentient bioweapons // Colicoid Creation Nest = Colicoid "corporation" [translation warning!]
This is Darth Malgus of the Expeditionary Fleet. If you can access this droid's message, I require your services.
The Colicoids have put a challenge before the Empire. You will compete in the name of the Emperor, and you will win.
Download all relevant information and resume message.
I don't jump hoops for bugs.
In this contest, the losers will not survive. But should you succeed, both you and the Empire will benefit substantially.
Message = ends // Lord Malgus's rendezvous coordinates = enclosed
Colicoid Creation Nest = hopes you will join us
